name: VeraTowers
description:
VeraTowers - fascinating browser game for all lovers of Tower Defense and Fantasy genre.

Modes for every taste are waiting for the players in the game.

In a single-player survival mode you are going to lead the army and to defend the tower against hordes of aggressive orcs.

But if You want to test Your strategist and warlord skills, so You are welcome to match Your strength with the real players in a PVP mode.

There are different races, towers, kinds of magic in Your hands.
